com.faanggang.wisetrack.controllers

Class GeolocationManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.faanggang.wisetrack.controllers.GeolocationManager

  • public class GeolocationManager
extends java.lang.Object
    GeolocationManager is a singleton controlling the fetching of the user's geolocation.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static GeolocationManager getInstance(android.content.Context context)
      getInstance provides the static instance of this singleton supplied with the context of the activity using the class.
      android.location.Location getLastLocation() 
      boolean isActivated() 
      void promptPermissions(android.app.Activity activity)
      promptPermissions prompts the user of the passed activity to accept Location permissions
      void setContext(android.content.Context context)
      setContext allows for the context of the Singleton to be change when in use by different activities
      void startLocationUpdates()
      startLocationUpdates starts location updates
      void stopLocationUpdate()
      stopLocationUpdates stops location updates.
